long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize Your Online World with SmartTab

Sick of tab overload? SmartTab is the AI-powered browser extension that effortlessly organizes your tabs into logical groups, making your browsing life easier.

Key Features:
•	Uses advanced AI to automatically group related tabs into Tab Groups based on their URL
•	Allows you to customize which URLs should or shouldn't be grouped
•	Collapses unused Tab Groups to declutter your browser window
•	Available as extension for Chrome based Browsers

Tired of having dozens of open tabs cluttering your browser and slowing down your computer? SmartTab uses intelligent AI to analyze webpage content and automatically group your open tabs into logical Tab Groups like Shopping, Travel, Work, and more. This removes the headache of manually organizing tabs and lets you instantly see related tabs in one glance.

Customize SmartTab to work the way you want. The extension allows you to set specific rules on which URLs should or shouldn't be grouped together. You're in full control. Unused Tab Groups also automatically collapse to get them out of your way, reducing visual clutter in your browser window.

Whether you're planning a vacation, researching a work project, or shopping online, SmartTab gives you an organized browsing experience that saves you time and mental energy. Download it today and say goodbye to tab overload!
